title: Skin missing
body: So i was doing the project promotion and I got the blue prints for Project yasuo and used the project cores to unlock the skin however the skin is missing from my inventory, is anyone else having problems similar to this?

replies.body: I don't believe Project Cores can be used for Yasuo on anything.  The only thing is receiving the first strike border for him if you own his skin before the end of the project disruption event.  I looked into this for you, and I see at one point you did have a project yasuo shard, but it was used to reroll it into  a Big Bad Warwick skin.  I hope that helps clear things up!
